schema.name: plc
schema.title: Candidates for astrometric lensing
schema.description: A catalogue of candidate stars for observing astrometric lensing using GAIA.

table.name: output
table.description: A catalogue of candidate stars for observing astrometric lensing using GAIA.

column.name: source
column.description: Source of the data of the lens

column.name: srcid
column.description: Id of lensing object

column.name: confirmed
column.description: 1 if lensing event confirmed

column.name: lensalpha
column.description: J2000 PPMX alpha of lens

column.name: lensdelta
column.description: J2000 PPMX delta of lens

column.name: lensmag
column.description: PPMX catalogue magnitude of lens

column.name: obalpha
column.description: J2000 USNO alpha of lensed object

column.name: obdelta
column.description: J2000 USNO delta of lensed object

column.name: obb
column.description: USNO-B B mag magnitude of lensed

column.name: mindate
column.description: Estimated time of closest approach (julian year)

column.name: mindist
column.description: Estimated minimal distance

column.name: simbad
column.description: Cone search around given position in Simbad

column.name: aladin
column.description: View in Aladin

table.name: plc.data
table.description: The final candidate table with estimates of minimal distances, epochs, etc.

column.name: source
column.description: Source of the data of the lens

column.name: srcid
column.description: Id of lensing object

column.name: lensalpha
column.description: J2000 PPMX alpha of lens

column.name: lensdelta
column.description: J2000 PPMX delta of lens

column.name: lensalphaerr
column.description: Error of lens alpha

column.name: lensdeltaerr
column.description: Error of lens delta

column.name: lenspmalpha
column.description: Lens PM in alpha, cos(delta) applied

column.name: lenspmdelta
column.description: Lens PM in delta

column.name: lenspmalphaerr
column.description: Error of Lens PM in alpha

column.name: lenspmdeltaerr
column.description: Error of Lens PM in delta

column.name: lensmag
column.description: PPMX catalogue magnitude of lens

column.name: lensrmag
column.description: PPMX Ru mag of lens

column.name: lensbmag
column.description: Lens B mag as in PPMX

column.name: lensvmag
column.description: Lens V mag as in PPMX

column.name: lensjmag
column.description: Lens J mag as in PPMX

column.name: lenshmag
column.description: Lens H mag as in PPMX

column.name: lenskmag
column.description: Lens K mag as in PPMX

column.name: obalpha
column.description: J2000 USNO alpha of lensed object

column.name: obdelta
column.description: J2000 USNO delta of lensed object

column.name: obalphaerr
column.description: Positional error of lensed object in alpha

column.name: obdeltaerr
column.description: Positional error of lensed object in delta

column.name: obpmalpha
column.description: Object PM in alpha

column.name: obpmdelta
column.description: Object PM in delta

column.name: obpmalphaerr
column.description: Error of Object PM in alpha

column.name: obpmdeltaerr
column.description: Error of Object PM in delta

column.name: obb
column.description: USNO-B B mag magnitude of lensed

column.name: obr
column.description: USNO-B R mag magnitude of lensed

column.name: obi
column.description: USNO-B I mag magnitude of lensed

column.name: obj
column.description: 2MASS J mag magnitude of lensed

column.name: obh
column.description: 2MASS H mag magnitude of lensed

column.name: obk
column.description: 2MASS K mag magnitude of lensed

column.name: mindate
column.description: Estimated time of closest approach (julian year)

column.name: mindateerr
column.description: Error in estimation of time of closest approach

column.name: mindist
column.description: Estimated minimal distance

column.name: mindisterr
column.description: Error in estimation of minimal distance

column.name: confirmed
column.description: 1 if lensing event confirmed
